EnableCartReminder.title: Enable Cart Reminder
EnableCartReminder.description: Enable Abandon Cart Reminder On Store Level

RemindUserAnonymous.title: Remind User Anonymous
RemindUserAnonymous.description: Enable This If you want to send notification to Anonymous user

RemindUserLogin.title: Remind Logins User
RemindUserLogin.description: Enable This If you want to send notification to login user

CartReminderEmailNotification.description: This notification sends email to customer to remind their abandon carts
